DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to investigate if there is an effect on exercise performance og of the anti inflammatory drugs prednisone and solu-medrol in patints with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease(COPD)
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Prednisone and Solu-Medrol on Physical Exercise in COPD Patients and Inflammatory Response During and After Exercise
DOC.criteria: FEV1< 60% FEV1/FVC ratio <70 % able to use a ergometer bike Haemodynamicaly unstable heart conditions exacerbations before 6 week entry of the study exacerbation during the study period treatment with beta blockers malignancy the last 5 years allergi toward IMP
